column4: Hi, having some trouble with Brasero. When it re-encodes a video to put on a dvd, it seems to do it using the super super fast mode or something, which produces a horrible result.
note it also insists on re-encoding, even when I give it a vob file with a mpeg-2 video stream and AC-3 audio
did you try viewing your video first using an app in your computer and then viewing the video again -- on your computer??

sounds youre using a format brasero doesnt like, so brasero uses a utility that automatically converts it to a format that it likes using default options.  Problem:  you dont like the default options.  Solution:  format the file youre trying to burn into a format brasero likes.  First find out what formats brasero likes then find out what format your file is int and then convert the format, there should be plenty of utilities
